revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Logic3 |model=Scuderia |revision=FS1 Air |asin= |price=649 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Kenwin |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/05/2013 |fcc_id=PAB2LFS002 |ic_id=10556A-2LFS002 |pcb_id=323A702403I7 |type=wireless speaker system, audio streamer |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=AC (figure-eight) |cpu1_brand=BridgeCo |cpu1_model=DM870A |cpu1_cspeed=240 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9812G6JH-6 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=BridgeCo |wi1_chip1_model=DM870A |wi1_chip2_brand=Thomson |wi1_chip2_model=DM6201C |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none=true |flags=Bluetooth, Audio in (3.5mm), Component out |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:07:F5 }} {{TagLine|AirPlay Wireless Speaker System}} :[http://www.ferrari-by-logic3.com/scuderia-fs1-air-ferrari-speaker Product page]
"NM-103-BB" and "323A702403I7" is silkscreened on the module board (CX870-3HB). :[[BridgeCo]] DM870A + [[Thomson]] 6201C (Eagle) - ''[[Lite-On]]'' (323) module ? :The MAC label on the board has a 00:07:F5 (''BridgeCo'') OUI.
"LOGIC 3 120W AIRPLAY MCU BOARD", "LOGIC 3 HD120 AIRPLAY.050.08", "FR4 L2MM" and :"Kenwin Digital Technology Limited" appears to be silkscreened on the daughterboard. :The daughterboard has a ''[[CSR]]'' (57E6, 87CG, 207AE) IC.
A USB port is available on the device for charging purposes. :This device will dock with an ''iPhone'' / ''iPad'' / ''iPod''.
{{See also|Philips Fidelio SoundSphere (DS6800W)}}
